title: High Intensity
description: Veronique "Ricky" Bouchard is a mountaineer that is hired to guide six people to the top of Mt. Everest. Allison Peabody, a stockbroker from Manhattan, is one of the climbers. Allison has always played by the rules and is looking for excitement in her life because she feels suffocated by the facade. Ricky is a loner who is at first put off by Allison, but that changes over their two month adventure.
author: Belle Reilly
